departments.name: Chemistry
departments.head: Dr. Ahmed Benmouhoub
departments.description: The Chemistry Department at University of Sétif has been at the forefront of chemical research and education since 1978. We offer comprehensive programs that cover all major branches of chemistry, with state-of-the-art laboratories and research facilities.
departments.tagline: Advancing chemical sciences through innovation and research

departments.name: Computer Science
departments.head: Dr. Fatima Zohra Kebir
departments.description: The Computer Science Department prepares students for the digital age with cutting-edge programs in software development, artificial intelligence, and data science. Our graduates are highly sought after in the tech industry.
departments.tagline: Shaping the future through computing innovation

departments.name: Mathematics
departments.head: Dr. Mohamed Taha
departments.description: The Mathematics Department offers rigorous programs that develop strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Our faculty are engaged in research across pure and applied mathematics.
departments.tagline: Exploring the language of the universe

departments.name: Physics
departments.head: Dr. Leila Boukhatem
departments.description: The Physics Department is dedicated to understanding the fundamental laws of nature through theoretical and experimental research. We offer programs that prepare students for careers in research, education, and industry.
departments.tagline: Unraveling the mysteries of the physical world
